content.description:
Cum intellegaremus noctem advenireadvenio, -ire = appropinquo, -are, tamen domo 
proficisci multum volebamus.
content.question: In the sentence, what does multum mean?

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
